title: Katarina needs a buff
body:
She is so weak so here is my idea.

All abilities on a 1 second cd. Her q should do 500 true dmg + 10.0 ability power scaling, do this for all her abilities other than ulti. Ulti should kill anyone and everyone on the map instantly dealing 1 million true damage. 

I think this will make her more viable.

Also rito please give me 5 million rp so I can get a kata skin then sell my account for 1 million dollars. 

Mucho love - Srtty {{champion:55}} {{item:3070}}
